head.supplied: 18/1/77. ¶ ¶ As far as I know, dear Mr Shillinglaw, it is only necessary, that I should write to the Secretary of the R.G.S. about your candidature. ¶ If however you prefer to make out a document, I...

div.p: Box 243/3 Shillinglaw papers, La Trobe Australian manuscripts collection, State Library of Victoria, Melbourne.

As far as I know, dear Mr Shillinglaw, it is only necessary, that I should write to the Secretary of the R.G.S. about your candidature.
See Certificate of Candidature, M to Royal Geographical Society, 26 March 1877. If however you prefer to make out a document, I will be happy to sign it.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
